parameters.query:
=UPDATE users SET
  free_stylize = CASE
    WHEN free_stylize > 0 THEN free_stylize - 1
    ELSE free_stylize
  END,
  star_balance = CASE
    WHEN free_stylize > 0 THEN star_balance
    ELSE star_balance - 8
  END
WHERE id = {{ $("generate").first().json.body.user_id }};

INSERT INTO generations (user_id, mode, result_type, result_url, prompt)
VALUES (
  '{{ $("generate").first().json.body.user_id }}',
  'stylize',
  'image',
  '{{ $("Check Result").first().json.image_url }}',
  '{{ $("generate").first().json.body.style || "" }}'
);

=
UPDATE users SET
  free_stylize = 1,
  free_remove_bg = 1,
  free_enhance = 1,
  free_reset_date = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE id = '{{ $json.body.user_id }}'
  AND (free_reset_date IS NULL OR free_reset_date < CURRENT_DATE);

SELECT COALESCE(free_stylize, 0) as free_left,
       COALESCE(star_balance, 0) as star_balance
FROM users WHERE id = '{{ $json.body.user_id }}';
=SELECT thread_id FROM user_topics WHERE user_id = '{{ $("generate").first().json.body.user_id }}' AND mode = 'stylize'

=INSERT INTO user_topics (user_id, mode, thread_id) VALUES ('{{ $("Prepare Send").first().json.user_id }}', '{{ $("Prepare Send").first().json.mode }}', {{ $("Create Topic").first().json.result.message_thread_id || $("Prepare Send").first().json.thread_id || 0 }}) ON CONFLICT (user_id, mode) DO UPDATE SET thread_id = EXCLUDED.thread_id

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify(Object.assign({ chat_id: String($('Prepare Send').first().json.user_id), document: $('Prepare Send').first().json.media_url, caption: $('Prepare Send').first().json.caption + '\n\nüìÑ –§–∞–π–ª –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ' }, ($json.result || {}).message_thread_id ? { message_thread_id: ($json.result || {}).message_thread_id } : {})) }}
